sentence: 1st Class Service
Very good amenities and pool service
the beach staff at the Fontainebleau was amazing
kudos to Yusuf Ihsan for his friendly smile and excellent service on the beach and to Dany who was part of the pool staff
Everything was delightful from the service VIP staff accommodations food oceanfront views boutiques and availability of snacks etc …
His service was consistent and on point and his energy was genuine and uplifting everyday
Employees were happy and helpful
Great facilities and pleasant staff
Beautiful resort with excele t customer service
Had an amazing time this weekend at the Fontainebleau this weekend thanks to awesome service from Hosana for our cabana by the pool
The staff is overall friendly but if the management of the property allow the hotel itself to be rundown then what can even the best of staff do

Location right on the beach separated by a community boardwalk about a 10 min taxi ride down to South Beach nothing really around it would not recommend walking around outside the propertyFacilities lots of small pools plenty of loungers plenty of fancy cabanas you can rent for something like 250 per day loungers are all made of a stretchy mesh material and the attendant will set it up with a cover and towel there are I think only 2 round wicker bed like loungers which do not cost anything but you have to get down there by about 9 am to snag them the attendant I had was generous with towels my bed was so comfy I stayed there all day and red a whole bok La Cote restaurant was good had lunch there right next to the pool you can sit in the shade on couches or at small tables next to these cool mist blowing fansRoms slightly out dated but still very clean and comfortable we had the smallest room Sorento tower floor 32 room 16 facing inwards towards Miami which was still lovely with a decent balcony large bathroom Queen bed sitting area and tiny kitchen area with microwave stove and bar sink bed was really comfortable air conditioning was efectiveStaf all staff were helpful and professional unfortunately at checkin they gave us the wrong room number which sent our bags to the wrong room which for some reason then took an hour to retrieve and redeliver you had think they would prioritize our situation given it was their eror everyone else in particular the staff by the pools and La Cote really stood out as being most helpful gracious and profesionalOveral we really enjoyed our stay at Fountainebleau
I hope that it is not meOUTSTANDING STAFF MEMBERS

Stayed at historic Fontainebleau Miami Beach beautiful property but low low class guests poor security and 1 star service hallways full of trash and garbage guest was in the main historic lobby in a bathrobe acting nuts at 10 pm
I am the contact for our board meeting being held here this weekend and the offending staff made no effort to care for me with good service when I needed it
LocationAmenities 24 hr room service
Great service from tavarus I did n’t have to lift a finger
Room service was right on time
This review is based off the service and the food that was received in my room
Staff was nice I do not have any complaints outside of the pool closes way too early
The staff treat you like special guests except for bartenders they were there to just do their jobs as fast as they could

The beach area adjacent to the hotel is beautiful but as soon as we got settled into our beach chairs which are complimentary if you are staying at the hotel the staff came and put up one of those day beds right in front of us that blocked our view of the water
There were long lines everywhere and you had to keep asking for help all these came with 20 service charge from all the restaurants
The staffs were overstretched for the new year week
Facility was great but Service was barely there
She went above and beyond customer service second to none
I do want to make it clear that the beach was beautiful food was great and the staff was friendly following rules that did n’t work under the circumstances
Not only is the hotel rooms and pool simply gorgeous but the staff here is so incredible and friendly
The rooms were great but honestly we spent more time on the beach than the room because of how immaculate the service was there
An employee Love Bazile saw that the person was struggling opening my phone and asked him to unlock it
Safety aside in the 3 hours prior to finding a stranger in the room I have to say that I have never experienced staff this rude in my life
I would have given it 5 stars but everything is ridiculously priced and a 20 service charge is attached to EVERYTHING
This took many visits to the front desk to rectify
Staff were unhelpful about moving me back to my reserved room and at one point said “ why are you tripping the upgrade is a newer room ”
This drink was so bad we ended up just sitting them on the counter because we could n’t get service for over 20 min to tell them how terrible these drinks were
Ricky our pool attendant was an actual life saver
Staff is unfriendly uninspired uncaring and worst of all unapologetic
I got the impression either the local pool staff was part of the scheme or just apathetic to the whole thing due to the frequency of how often it happens
the service is not organized very slow and sometimes rude and the breakfast everyday is similar they do n’t change nothing about it
I saw 2 large jacuzis in the pool areas unsure if more We did nt get a chance to try out any of the restaurants in the resort but they looked great too we did try the cafe left of the reception desk
